author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video I discuss how people have been getting their Google accounts deleted for photos synced to Google drive and images generated with AI that falsely get get flagged for CSAM or other policy violations. Google has a history of not re-instating disabled accounts even have law enforcement investigations conclude there was no crime committed.
